name: places/ChIJH2Es_dhZwokRQSFj7Xqg8ZQ
formattedAddress: 40 W 57th St Suite 1720, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 40 W 57th St Suite 1720, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
It really takes me a while to write this comment about the building I live in, but there are unethical facts that everyone should know.This is my 2nd year in this building and I decided to make changes in the buildingI reported this situation to the management and they pretended to help me at first.When they saw that I was eager to move, they contacted a guy named Timothy G.For this person, I have to tell you that he is an opportunistic, greedy broker or company employee who plays bad cop.When the application was passed to Timothy G, he offered me a price opposite to the street easy listing and tried to get me to accept it.Based on my 10 years of investor experience in the real estate industry, I did not agree with this cheap sales policy.
As a listing, you can see the ad on Street Easy for 2 months free rent, but when it comes to the negotiation stage, they make you accept the same price for 1 month free In addition, when such a listing is placed, the choice of payment belongs to the tenantWhat I mean is that they falsely attract potential tenants and show their real faces in a disgusting way during the agreement/signing.
These types of sales policies are very common with greedy management and landlords and are also ugly in the 140-160 riverside blvd apartments You can see what I want to say in the attached pictures.

originalText.text: Recently rented an apartment with 1898 leasing and am SOOO appreciative of the HIGH level of professionalism, compassion and experience Brooklyn Leigh St. John brought to our apartment search.  Brooklyn ALWAYS answered my questions in a timely manner and communicated effectively with all the requisite parties involved in our somewhat unique housing process.  During our somewhat protracted search, we encountered countless leasing agents.  I feel quite comfortable asserting that Brooklyn was the best!

originalText.text:
I just rented the apartment with 1898 leasing today..so far I would like to give 5 stars review for my agent Adriana. She is very professional and I asked so many questions and sent her email/messages whenever I have questions. She did answers all the questions that I asked, never missed anything.  During  the renting process within a week everything was easy and well processed..
Thanks Adriana  and teams
..

originalText.text: Worst experience ever, I have paid the deposit + rent for the apartment in flushing also signed the lease documents but still haven’t received any information on key release documents as well as how can I get the keys for the apartment. Tomorrow is my move in date. Nobody’s answering the calls, nobody’s replying on emails.

originalText.text: This is the highest level of unprofessionalism we have ever encountered. We have been trying to reach Sajma for 2 weeks with no replies and we were ready to start the application however because of no response there is no way we are prepared to invest with a company that doesn't bother even to respond.
